channel.title: How to make a downloadble client
channel.description: Yes i realize it is a very stupid question but i dont know so.... TO make a downloadable client what do i have to make people download as in i have my downlaod client and source for me but what do i put for other people to donwload and play the client. What files do i make them download??

item.title: How to make a downloadble client
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Seperate your Client Folder from the package you downloaded.

Make sure a working run.bat is in there. Zip or Rar the folder, meaning right click on it and add it to an archive. Upload the Zipped or Rared file to an file hosting website of your choosing.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a downloadble client

item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

Sanskrit:

I suggest making your client into a jar file, then releasing it for download.

HOw do i do that

item.title: How to make a downloadble client
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

Separate the Source and client, and tell them to download the client, upload the client file to any site, then put that on there.
